entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
MORE HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
